content.rendered:
Optimizing Your Building’s Facility Operations

Alticor Inc takes a holistic, integrated approach to professional consulting that marries your corporate vision and mission with our Subject Matter Experts (SMEs). Together, we explore the best and most strategic ways to preserve your property assets based on data, research and intelligence.

Alticor Inc is a proven industry leader and trusted advisor. Ensuring a balance of quality and value for your facility, all consulting programs are fully customized to achieve your business goals.

Alticor Inc’ Transitional Solutions Offerings (TSO) is a proven transition process that focuses on delivery of stabilized facility operations. The TSO process has been developed and refined over decades of facility operations. Alticor Inc provides a custom approach to transitioning to facility operation stabilization for new facilities, vendor transitions, and/or other transitional situations.

The result of the entire TSO process creates a long-term bottom-line benefit through asset preservation and energy consumption savings.

Alticor Inc Consulting Services comprises of two primary elements: Consulting / Commissioning and Transitional Solutions.

Consulting / Commissioning

With expertise in all consulting services listed below, Alticor Inc is a proven industry leader and trusted advisor. Ensuring a balance of quality and value for your facility, all consulting programs are fully customized to achieve your business goals.

Transitional Solutions 

Alticor Inc’ Transitional Solutions Offerings (TSO) is a proven transition process that focuses on delivery of stabilized facility operations. This structured approach provides a seamless and proven platform for immediate success in maintaining the building infrastructure on Day One. The outcome from the first two stages of TSO is a facility playbook for operational processes, procedures and training. As a result of the final two stages of the TSO process, clients realize the enhanced benefits of asset preservation, energy efficiency, and optimized facility life cycle costs.
